message: Hello, I want to order a pizza

Hello! I'd be happy to help you with that. I see the Pepperoni pizza on our menu for AED 43.0. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel. If you need further assistance, feel free to ask!

Great! I have placed your order for the Pepperoni pizza. It is AED 43.0 as per our menu. Now, could you please provide me with your NYU ID and phone number so I can complete your order? Also, do let me know which building you are currently in or would like to pick up the order from.

Thank you for providing your NYU ID. Now, could you please provide me with your phone number so I can complete your order? Also, do let me know which building you are currently in or would like to pick up the order from.
